Uses of Class
de.pifpafpuf.web.html.Html

  • Packages that use Html 
    Package Description
    de.pifpafpuf.web.html
    simple classes to generate an HTML DOM tree intended for generating HTML output.

    • Uses of Html in de.pifpafpuf.web.html

      Methods in de.pifpafpuf.web.html that return Html 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Html Html.add(String tagname)
      adds a child element for the given tagname and returns it.
      Html Html.addEncoded(String text)
      like addText(java.lang.String) but the given text must already be properly HTML encoded, because on output with FormattingHtml.print(java.lang.Appendable, int) it is not encoded.
      Html Html.addText(String text)
      adds a child element with the given text.
      Html Html.addTight(String tagname)
      convenience method combining add(String) and setTight() for the generated child element.
      Html Html.setAttr(String key, String value)
      calls EmptyElem.setAttr(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), but returns this to allow fluent use.
      Html Html.setTight()
      calls FormattingHtml.setTight(boolean) with true.
